updates.details: Mobile UI changes for easier accessibility
Fixed Yun Jin's incorrect rarity & code rework.
Changed /characters & /artifact pages & some other UI stuff.
Switched hosting Provider from Netlify to Cloudflare Pages
Various UI changes around the site to help with scaling and theme consistency
Added a Mobile Navbar to make the site easier to navigate on mobile
Added a search feature for /characterparts & /splashart, making it easier for you to search for whatever you need
Added reccomended artifacts for each character in /characters
2.8 character parts are now available on /characterparts & added Heizou's data in /characters
